name: Opal Princess 4 Peak Ring
description:
I am OBSESSED with opals and have made this sterling silver rocky ring, individually engraved and hammer set with a solid australian opal. This delicate piece flashes with green/pink/red fire. A stunner.

Also looks great stacked with peak rings and narcissus rings.

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make and ship your ring, which will arrive in a KV jewels gift box.

Need it sooner? Want another size? Like to talk about a customised ring? Please email me at kim@kimvictoriajewels.com

name: Peak Ring - Diamonds and Silver
description:
A delicate, sparkling and tough, carved and individually engraved sterling silver ring. Each ring features 3 grain set reclaimed diamonds that have been salvaged from vintage jewellery.

This ring is available also in 9ct rose gold, 9ct yellow gold and plain sterling silver.

This listing is for a single ring only.

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make and ship your ring, which will arrive in a KV jewels gift box.

Need it sooner? Want another size? Like to talk about a customised ring? Please email me at kim@kimvictoriajewels.com

xKV

name: Peak Ring - Silver
description:

name: Narcissus Ring - Lemon Quartz
description:
A beautiful 6mm lemon quartz* stone set in a carved and individually engraved sterling silver ring. 

The narcissus ring is part of the Mystic Opal Princess collection and is named for each stones mesmerising quality - a pool of colour that you could get lost in.

This listing is for a single ring only.

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make and ship your ring. 

Need it sooner? Want another size? Like to talk about a customised ring? Please email me at kim@kimvictoriajewels.com

xKV

*lemon quartz are irradiated and heat treated to achieve their unusual colour. If you would like an untreated alternative, I am happy to help.

name: Peak Ring - Rose Gold
description:
A delicate but tough, carved and individually engraved 9ct rose/pink gold ring.

The process of casting the ring and then rubbing back and engraving it leaves the surface with a rosy hue mixed with a golden tone. I really love the effect. The patina will gradually change with time and reveal more of the rose colour.

This ring is available also in 9ct yellow gold, sterling silver and sterling silver with reclaimed diamonds.

This listing is for a single ring only.

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make and ship your ring, which will arrive in a KV jewels gift box.

Need it sooner? Want another size? Like to talk about a customised ring? Please email me at kim@kimvictoriajewels.com

name: Mystic Crater Ring - Swiss Blue Topaz
description:
A roughly hewn sterling silver ring, individually engraved, featuring a central 'crater' set with a 4mm swiss blue topaz.* 

Please allow 2 weeks for me to make and ship your ring, which will arrive in a KV jewels gift box.

Need it sooner? Want another size? Like to talk about a customised ring? Please email me at kim@kimvictoriajewels.com

*swiss blue topaz are irradiated and heat treated to achieve their colour. If you would like an untreated alternative, I am happy to help.

description:

name: Flower Sequin Diamond Earrings
description:
A pair of glittering diamonds set into sterling silver earrings. 

Each pair is made to order, please allow two weeks for your little gems to be made and shipped.

name: Ruby Sequin Earring
description:
Dainty silver sequin studs containing a small pinky-red ruby. I can make these earring containing other stones so please send me an email if you would like a quote for a specific stone.
These earrings are made to order, please allow two weeks for your piece to be made and shipped.

name: Sequin Ring - Gold
description:
Silver ring plated in 18ct Yellow Gold.

Each piece is made to order so please allow two weeks for me to make and ship your piece.

Sequin-Tooth Tiger is a collection that combines distinctly man-made elements and technologies, such as ornate beading and rapid prototyping, alongside earthy materials and lo-fi hand techniques. It seeks to create a small world of intricate pieces that initially appear as though they could have evolved in the natural environment, but upon closer inspection are comprised of sequin shapes and faceted stones.

I imagine a Sequin-Tooth Tiger roaming sleekly through a landscape of these pieces, occasionally losing one of his timber teeth, whereupon I collect it, string it on some silk, and wear it proudly as an amulet.

name: Medium Mountain Ring - Lemon Quartz
description:
Piercingly beautiful lemon quartz stone set in a carved and engraved sterling silver ring. Each piece is individually made so will vary slightly from that pictured. To the mountain!

Each piece is made to order so please allow two weeks for me to make and ship your piece.

*lemon quartz are irradiated and heat treated to achieve their unusual colour. If you would like an untreated alternative, I am happy to help.

name: Tiny Sequin Studs
description:
Dainty yet opulent sequin studs. Each stud measures approx 10mm in diameter and is individually engraved. Available in gold plated or silver.

Only available in Sterling Silver at the moment. More gold plated earrings will be in stock early 2014.

Each piece is made to order so please allow two weeks for me to make and ship your piece.

name: Sequin Bullet Gold Necklace
description:
Sterling silver necklace dipped in 18ct Yellow Gold. Each piece is individually made and engraved so will vary slightly. The piece comes on a 500mm chain with clasp or a 750mm continuous chain.

Each piece is made to order so please allow two weeks for me to make and ship your piece.

name: Sequin Ring - Silver
description:

Each piece is made to order so please allow two weeks for me to make and ship your piece.

Sequin-Tooth Tiger is a collection that combines distinctly man-made elements and technologies, such as ornate beading and rapid prototyping, alongside earthy materials and lo-fi hand techniques. It seeks to create a small world of intricate pieces that initially appear as though they could have evolved in the natural environment, but upon closer inspection are comprised of sequin shapes and faceted stones.
